name: VR STOCK CAR RACERS
description: SAT-BOX's 2nd VR racing game presented 「VR STOCK CAR RACERS」 Let's ride a stock car and run a circuit that can run only on VR. For example, sea, mountain, night city...... Sound speed machine of nitro + supercharger! High speed time which can only be used for 3 seconds!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or higher Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset is Required
